Citation

von Bergmann J, Shkolnik D and Jacobs A (2018). cancensus: Canadian Census Data and Geography from the 'CensusMapper' API. R package version 0.1.6, https://mountainmath.github.io/cancensus/. 

@Manual{,
  author = {Jens {von Bergmann} and Dmitry Shkolnik and Aaron Jacobs},

  note = {R package version 0.1.6},
